name: A Drunk Man Looks at the Thistle DECODED
name_original: A Drunk Man Looks at the Thistle DECODED
description:
"A Drunk Man Looks at the Thistle"
by Scottish poet Hugh MacDiarmid
was published in 1926.

@LadyOrTheTiger wanted to know
what happened to the titular drunk man.
Did he prick his thumbs on the thistle's needles?

Play the game to find out.

Made for Gaming Like It's 1926.
From January 1st 2022, works from 1926
entered the public domain.

This narrative game documents the process
of a pleb decoding a rather baffling poem.
